shortDescription: Professional custom winter coat fitting for dogs of all breeds and sizes.
longDescription:
Keep your dog warm, dry, and moving freely all winter long.
Our experienced tailors take precise measurements of neck, chest, length, and leg openings.
We use premium insulated, water-repellent fabrics that are lightweight yet incredibly warm.
Choose from dozens of colors, reflective trims, and fun patterns.
The entire session lasts 30-45 minutes and your dog walks out wearing their new coat the same day.
Perfect for short-haired breeds, puppies, seniors, or any dog that shivers in the cold.
Coats are machine-washable and come with a 60-day adjustment guarantee.  
We can add harness holes or modify for special needs (e.g., IVDD, wheelchairs).
Hundreds of happy pups stay cozy every winter thanks to our perfect fits.
Book early — slots disappear fast when the first snow falls!
Your dog will thank you with extra tail wags all season.

shortDescription: Made-to-measure cozy sweaters crafted especially for cats.
longDescription:
Even the grumpiest cats secretly love being warm.
We specialize in stress-free measuring sessions using treats and calm handling.
Soft, stretchy, breathable yarns that never itch or restrict movement.
Choose classic cable knit, holiday themes, or minimalist solid colors.
Every sweater is pre-shrunk and machine-washable for easy care.
Ideal for Sphynx, Devon Rex, seniors, or any cat that seeks heated blankets.
Most cats adjust within 1-2 days and then refuse to take them off.
We can add belly coverage or longer sleeves for extra warmth.
Same-day service available on most orders under 15 lbs.
Hundreds of cats stay toasty and stylish every winter.
Your feline overlord deserves the very best — book their custom sweater today!

shortDescription: Deep hydrating winter groom that fights dryness and keeps coats shiny.
longDescription:
Winter air + indoor heating = dry, flaky skin and static-filled fur.
Our winter package starts with a gentle oatmeal shampoo to soothe irritation.
Followed by rich moisturizing conditioner and hot-oil treatment tailored to coat type.
We detangle mats, remove excess undercoat, and apply anti-static finishing spray.
Paw pads get extra balm to prevent cracking from cold floors.
Long-haired pets receive sanitary trims and fluff-drying in a warm room.
Short-haired pets enjoy a skin-soothing massage that boosts circulation.
Nails are trimmed and ears cleaned as standard.
The entire session leaves your pet smelling fresh and feeling comfortable.
Recommended every 4-6 weeks throughout the cold season.
You’ll notice less shedding on your furniture and happier, itch-free pets.
Book now and give your furry friend the ultimate winter spa day.

shortDescription: Natural paw wax barrier against ice, salt, and freezing sidewalks.
longDescription:
Salt and de-icers cause painful cracks and chemical burns on tender paw pads.
Our 100% organic wax blends beeswax, shea butter, coconut oil, and vitamin E.
We gently clean and dry each paw before massaging the wax deep into pads and between toes.
Creates a flexible, breathable shield that lasts 5-7 days even with daily walks.
Completely safe if licked in small amounts — no toxic ingredients.
Perfect for city dogs walking on treated sidewalks or country pups in snow.
Clients report zero limping and noticeably softer pads after first application.
Quick 15-minute service — great add-on to any grooming or walking package.
We also teach you how to re-apply at home between visits.
Protect those precious paws before the next snowstorm hits!

serviceName: Heated Bed Rental for Small Pets
shortDescription: Rent a safe, cozy heated bed for the whole winter season.
longDescription:
No need to buy an expensive heated bed you’ll store 9 months of the year.
Choose between self-warming thermal pads or low-voltage electric beds with thermostat.
All beds are chew-resistant and have overheat protection for total safety.
Perfect for small dogs, cats, rabbits, guinea pigs, and senior pets with arthritis.
Washable fleece covers included — we deliver clean and collect at season end.
Great for hairless breeds, post-surgery recovery, or pets who love warm spots.
Monthly and seasonal rates — the longer you rent, the lower the daily cost.
Hundreds of pets stay pain-free and cozy thanks to our rental program.
Reserve yours today and give your companion the gift of constant warmth.

shortDescription: Quick, safe 15-20 minute winter walks for cold-sensitive dogs.
longDescription:
Many dogs still need exercise but can’t handle long exposure to freezing temperatures.
Our insured walkers arrive with booties, coats, and snoods if needed.
We choose routes away from salted sidewalks and icy patches.
Each walk is GPS-tracked with real-time updates and cute photos sent to you.
Paws are towel-dried and inspected immediately after returning home.
Ideal for small breeds, seniors, pugs, bulldogs, or any dog that gets cold fast.
Multiple time slots daily, even during snowstorms.
Short bursts of activity keep weight off and spirits high all winter.
Clients love the peace of mind knowing their pups stay active and safe.

shortDescription: Comprehensive winter wellness exam focused on cold-weather health risks.
longDescription:
Winter hides problems: stiff joints, dry skin infections, and lower immunity.
Our vets perform a nose-to-tail exam with special attention to arthritis signs.
We check weight, listen to heart and lungs, examine ears, skin, and paw pads.
Joint flexibility tests and pain assessment included at no extra charge.
You’ll receive personalized advice on supplements, indoor exercise, and diet tweaks.
Early detection prevents expensive emergencies later in the season.
Includes free sample of joint treats or immune booster while supplies last.
Highly recommended for pets over 7 years or breeds prone to hip issues.
Book this limited cold-season special before slots run out!

shortDescription: Expert winter diet plan to boost immunity and maintain perfect weight.
longDescription:
Colder weather increases calorie needs, but less activity can lead to weight gain.
Our certified pet nutritionist reviews current food, treats, age, and health conditions.
You receive a complete winter feeding schedule with portion sizes and meal timing.
Learn which foods strengthen immunity, support joints, and prevent dry skin.
We recommend specific brands or balanced homemade recipes if you prefer.
Printed plan + two weeks of WhatsApp follow-up support included.
Clients see shinier coats, better energy, and fewer vet visits.
Perfect for seniors, picky eaters, or pets with allergies.
Give your companion the nutrition edge this winter — book your consult now!

shortDescription: Professional fitting of waterproof, anti-slip winter boots for dogs and cats.
longDescription:
Wrong-sized boots fall off or cause blisters — our fitters guarantee perfection.
We stock rugged boots with thick soles that stop ice balls and salt burn.
Reflective strips and secure velcro straps on every pair for safety.
Your pet tries multiple sizes while we watch gait and comfort level.
Positive-reinforcement treats help even nervous dogs accept boots quickly.
Most pets walk normally within minutes of proper fitting.
30-day comfort guarantee — full refund if your pet refuses them.
Boots are lightweight yet incredibly durable in snow and slush.
Walk out ready for any winter adventure the same day.
Protect paws and enjoy longer, happier walks all season!
